title: november 26: two chinas, one olympics
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about how the Olympics got in the middle of a geopolitical dispute. Then, reminds us of a joke by a Canadian police constable that went totally viral. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
